statements.select: select * from aers_tbl_events_qt where EveresId in (select EveresId from aers_tbl_eventsresume where ExamineState=1)
select * from aers_tbl_events_qt where EveresId in (select EveresId from aers_tbl_eventsresume where ExamineState=1 and EveresLevel=#EveresLevel#)
select DetailTypeQt,count(*) as ccc from aers_tbl_events_qt where HappenedDate>=#HappenedDate# and DetailType=112 and DetailTypeQt!='' GROUP BY DetailTypeQt order by ccc desc
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO aers_tbl_events_qt ( EveqtId, EveresId, HospId, HospDepId, DetailType, DetailTypeQt, HappenedDate, SendtoDate, FillStaff, HospNumber, PatientSex, PatientAge, PatientAgeUnit, NursLevel, Diagnosis, EventDescription, EventLevel, StaffType, StaffTypeQt, StaffPosition, StaffEducation, StaffEduQt, StaffWorkyears, BedUtilization, BedNurseRatio, AuditFeedback, AuditStatus, Remark, IsFlag, OperatorDate, OperatorID
) VALUES ( #EveqtId#, #EveresId#, #HospId#, #HospDepId#, #DetailType#, #DetailTypeQt#, #HappenedDate#, #SendtoDate#, #FillStaff#, #HospNumber#, #PatientSex#, #PatientAge#, #PatientAgeUnit#, #NursLevel#, #Diagnosis#, #EventDescription#, #EventLevel#, #StaffType#, #StaffTypeQt#, #StaffPosition#, #StaffEducation#, #StaffEduQt#, #StaffWorkyears#, #BedUtilization#, #BedNurseRatio#, #AuditFeedback#, #AuditStatus#, #Remark#, #IsFlag#, #OperatorDate#, #OperatorID# )
statements.update: UPDATE aers_tbl_events_qt SET EveqtId = #EveqtId#, EveresId = #EveresId#, HospId = #HospId#, HospDepId = #HospDepId#, DetailType = #DetailType#, DetailTypeQt=#DetailTypeQt#, HappenedDate = #HappenedDate#, SendtoDate = #SendtoDate#, FillStaff = #FillStaff#, HospNumber = #HospNumber#, PatientSex = #PatientSex#, PatientAge = #PatientAge#, PatientAgeUnit=#PatientAgeUnit#, NursLevel = #NursLevel#, Diagnosis = #Diagnosis#, EventDescription = #EventDescription#, EventLevel = #EventLevel#, StaffType = #StaffType#, StaffTypeQt = #StaffTypeQt#, StaffPosition = #StaffPosition#, StaffEducation = #StaffEducation#, StaffEduQt = #StaffEduQt#, StaffWorkyears = #StaffWorkyears#, BedUtilization = #BedUtilization#, BedNurseRatio = #BedNurseRatio#, AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus#, Remark = #Remark#, IsFlag = #IsFlag#, OperatorDate = #OperatorDate#, OperatorID = #OperatorID# WHERE (EveqtId = #EveqtId#)
UPDATE aers_tbl_events_qt SET AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus# WHERE (EveresId = #EveresId#)
